title: How do I disable Y536A1 power-intensive notification?
answer:
Go to **Settings** and touch **Power saving**. Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141024001451631001.png) and choose **Settings** from the option menu. On the displayed **Settings** screen, turn off **Power-intensive prompt**.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141024001452826002.png)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141024001452684003.png)

                                       The figures are for your
reference only. The actual screens may vary.
